title: March Haigh Reservoir Walking Route

description: This circular walk visits the viewpoint at Buckstones Edge and March Haigh Reservoir on Marsden Moor. The walk starts from the Buckstones car park to the north of the reservoir on the New Hey Road. Here you'll find the National Trust's Buckstones Edge viewpoint where there are wonderful views down to the reservoir. You can then follow footpaths south to the reservoir and dam wall. Footpaths run along the northern side of the water before looping round to return to the car park.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: It's easy to continue your reservoir walking in the area by heading north to the nearby Booth Wood Reservoir, Deanhead Reservoir and Scammonden Reservoir.

display_address: New Hey Road, Kirklees, West Yorkshire, England, HD7 6NR, United Kingdom
